MKV advantages over AVI?
* supports H.264/AVC
* B-Frame support
* supports variable audio bitrate
* supports chapters, muxed subtitles, metadata/tags and dvd-like menus

Unfortunately there are no MKV-players out yet
@umarnawazkhan, you are wrong...Western Digital has a couple of MKV players with USB inputs. You can connect your portable hard drive to it and can view MKV files. You also get HDMI outputs.
